content:
Calculate my age if I provide my date of birth in the format DD/MM/YYYY, such as '28/02/1997'?
Begin!

I need to first obtain the current date to calculate your age based on the provided date of birth. I'll call the function to check the health of the tool that will facilitate this calculation. 

Let's proceed.

The tool is in working condition. I will now calculate the current date, which will help in computing the age later. Since I don't have an explicit function to get the current date, I'll assume I should merely execute the age calculation process once the user provides their date of birth.

It's crucial to prompt the user for their date of birth in the correct format. I need to hold on to the current logic until I successfully capture their input. 

I'll call the Finish function now to indicate I can't proceed without the user's specific input.

function.arguments: {"final_answer":"Please provide your date of birth in the format DD/MM/YYYY to calculate your age.","return_type":"give_answer"}
function.name: Finish
